EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Retreat to the Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Trapfinding feat if you did not have it already. Each core ability in this tree, including this one, grants +1 Epic bonus to all Spell DCs, +10 Melee Power, +6 Ranged Power, +5 Force Spellpower, and +5 Universal spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Step Through Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to conjure a door of pure Shadow, which can take you and your party members to the entrance of the current dungeon. Cooldown: 2 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: The Darkest Luck
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Evasion feat (normal Evasion rules apply). If you already have Evasion, you gain the Improved Evasion feat. If you already have Improved Evasion, you generate 25% less threat from all sources.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Hide and Move Silently. Rank 3: You gain the Hide in Plane Sight feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Cover of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30]% less threat from all sources. Rank 3: You gain the benefits of the Nightshield spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Builders
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an ability that builds charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nightmare Lance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Builder: A lance of darkness extends from your fingers, impaling an enemy. They take 1d6+6 Force damage per Character level. The enemy must succeed on a (DC20 + highest of Int/Wis/Cha modifier + Illusion DC bonuses) will saving throw to avoid becoming blinded. On cast, this builds an Arcane Charge. Cooldown: 30/20/10 seconds. Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shrouding Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder: Ranged Attack: +1/2/3W, you gain 1 Martial Charge. On a failed fortitude save (DC20 + Highest Ability Modifier + Assassinate bonus) the target is Blinded for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 12 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shrouding Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder: Melee Attack: +1/2/3W, you gain 1 Martial Charge. On a failed fortitude save (DC20 + Highest Ability Modifier + Assassinate bonus) the target is Blinded for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 12 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Assassinate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Assassinate DCs. Rank 3: On Sneak Attack: 10% chance to gain 1 Martial Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Technician
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Search, Spot, Disable Device, and Open Lock. Rank 3: If you have the Nimble Fingers feat, you gain +1 Sneak Attack Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Long Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Martial Charge now grants +1 Sneak Attack Dice. You no longer automatically fail Reflex saving throws when you roll a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Sleight of Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10]% Offhand Strike Chance, +[2/4/6] Bluff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadowform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle. +[10/20/30]% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed, and can Sneak +[20/35/50]% faster (this will not stack with other enhancements that grant a permanent bonus to movement speed while sneaking). Your attacks gain Ghost Touch, and may bypass the Incorporeality of monsters.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Meld into Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Martial Spender: You gain 10% uncapped Dodge per Martial Charge for [10/15/20] seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Lithe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Reflex Saving Throws, Armor Class, and Light Armor Max Dex Bonus. +[3/6/10] Force and Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Depths of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle grants +[1/2/3] Sneak Attack Dice and +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Crippled with Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Crippling Strike feat. If you already have this feat, it will deal Constitution Damage on each hit instead of Strength. +1 Martial Charge cap

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Grim Precision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You bypass [5/10/15]% enemy fortification and [1/2/3]% enemy dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to Specialize in.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Whispers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Create an Illusory Shadow that acts as a Noisemaker trap. Cooldown: [60/50/40] Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Pierce the Gloom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to hit, to-hit for Sneak attacks, and to-hit while Flanking. Rank 3: You gain Immunity to Silence, Quell, and Blindness.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Dark Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Physical and Magical Resistance Rating, +3 Force and Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Dark Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle now grants +[5/10/15]% damage versus the Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: The Drop
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The First Blood feat now deals double its base damage, applies on harmful spellcasts, and its damage now scales with 100% of your Force Spellpower. Whenever you cast an Illusion spell, gain 1 Arcane Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Linger in the Dark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tumbling while in Stealth now grants you a Martial Charge, +2 Sneak Attack Dice, +5 to hit and damage with Sneak Attacks, +5 Hide and Move Silently, and the ability to sneak with full movement speed for 20 seconds. This may only trigger once every 1 minute.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Improved Shadowform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle: Cloak yourself in magic and assume the form of an illusory Shadow. This form grants you 25% Incorporeality, +20 Hide and Move Silently, allows you to cast with a reduced movement speed penalty, and allows you to float as if you had Feather Fall. Also, when you roll a natural 20 on a melee or ranged attack, you envelop the target in shadow, removing its immunity to Sneak Attack for a short duration. You do not need to be in Shadowform for this to happen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Just a Taste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have +1 Critical Multiplier on a roll of 19-20 with Bows, Thrown Weapons, Crossbows, and Finessable melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Weird
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The Weird spell is added to your Spellbook as a level 9 spell if you are a Cleric, Sorcerer, Druid, Wizard, or Favored Soul or a level 6 spell if you are an Artificer, Alchemist, Bard, or Warlock. Requires the ability to cast spells of those levels. Weird: A targeted foe and all nearby enemies are subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect, with a DC20 + highest of INT/WIS/CHA modifier + Illusion spell bonuses to prevent the death.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Greater Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3]% dodge, +[1/2/3] Assassinate DC, +[2/4/6] Reflex Saving Throws. Rank 3: +1% Dodge Cap
